title: Somebody else afk'd in a ranked and i got leaverbusted
body: They left the game at level 2 after feeding 3 times, so my entire team waited at base for the enemy to end it at little under 9mintues. Now i have a 20minute queue on each game i play.

replies.body: And this is why riot needs a system like dota 2, if someone leaves or afks within the first 5 minutes u can leave the game and start again unpunished
The chat doesnt qualify as u are active..... If it did gg macro users will never get banned
we weren't afk, we were standing in base talking to the enemy and amongst ourselves.

...

Well of course that would happen. You went afk too, as well as the original person.

Like seriously what did you expect?
